Name: Escape!!
About the game: ESCAPE!! is an endless runner through a haunted forest. Jump, slide, kick and close your eyes to survive. Beautiful handmade pixel art, with frightening monsters and a terrified survivor. In the 5 level Story Mode, Sally Holmes sprints through a terrible forest, trying to find her fam. She must avoid not only the monster chasing her, but also each of the frightening things she encounters. Infinite Mode has Sally running from a monster for as long as she can, everything getting faster and faster. Siesta Mode gives Sally a chance to relieve all the Tension she's built up running from monsters. She can Sleep, Eat, or Relax in the hot springs.
